title: Researchers link 3AM ransomware to Conti, Royal cybercrime gangs
description: Security researchers analyzing the activity of the recently emerged 3AM ransomware operation uncovered close connections with infamous groups, such as the Conti syndicate and the Royal ransomware gang. [...]

title: Meta won't remove fake Instagram profiles that are clearly catfishing
description: Meta seems to be falling short of effectively tackling fake Instagram profiles even when there are sufficient signs to indicate that a profile is misusing someone else's photos and identity. [...]

title: Meta won't remove fake Instagram profiles used for obvious catfishing
description: Meta seems to be falling short of effectively tackling fake Instagram profiles even when there are sufficient signs to indicate that a profile is misusing someone else's photos and identity. [...]

title: Russian hackers stole Microsoft corporate emails in month-long breach
description: Microsoft disclosed Friday night that some of its corporate email accounts were breached and data stolen by the Russian state-sponsored hacking group Midnight Blizzard. [...]
